Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires background checks prior to employment in a position involving substantial contact with children while dressed as a children's character
Summary: Requires background checks for a person prior to employment in a position involving substantial contact with children while dressed as a children's character and provides certain penalties for violations.
LawCode: Ren ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to employment of sex offenders in a position involving substantial contact with children while dressed as a children's character
